Description: Pre-owned pair of Authentic Oakley Polarized sunglasses. Great shape, excellent condition. The glasses look very nice and pretty clean, seems that the glasses were barely worn. Except for a small moderate scratch below a center of the left side and a couple of the minor ones towards the right side of the right lens - it should not be noticeable when glasses are on and it does not obstruct my view, however, you may notice it up close at the certain lightning due to the mirrored technology of the lenses. The frame is in a great shape as well! Please see pictures for better understanding the condition of the glasses. Very stylish sunglasses made with the top quality of the brand! Model: OO9102-50 Size: 55-18 137Comes with the authentic Oakley case ( which is alone $25) and carrying pouch. NO RETURNS accepted unless the item is grossly misrepresented. Payment must be made within 2 days. Unpaid item case will be opened automatically after 48 hours of nonpayment, if you need more time or have any difficulties to pay please let me know before place a bid/win/purchase the item so we can work it out. Do not consider glasses as flawless, they are still pre-owned. I will consider only reasonable offers. You are responsible to do your own research/ try the size of the glasses. These are a used pair of sunglasses meaning they might be previously worn and be tiny bit stretched or adjusted for a certain person. The good news that most of them are plastic frame and the adjustment takes only a couple of mins for an optician. I would recommend stopping by an optical store that sells sunglasses and ask them to adjust it, usually, they take a few bucks for or something nothing at all. Sunglasses are always a personal item and need to be adjusted for everybody. I will not accept a return based on it is not for your face. Kindly note that I'm describing the glasses how I see that. Lighting, vision, the line of sight and sensitivity to scratches are subjective. The main point of the description is to give you an idea of the condition, even with the pics attached to see how it looks and where it is located and then you need to decide if it works for you. ( some of the people are very sensitive, some of them not even bothered by deep scratch). If there are any concerns regarding the product, you must contact us within 72 hours after delivery, otherwise, it will not be considered. Please contact me if you have any questions before purchasing for more details.
